trans-unit.source: Provides access to the state of the control designer in the design host through the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentDesignerStateService"></xref> interface.
trans-unit.target: Fornece acesso ao estado do designer de controle no host de design por meio de <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentDesignerStateService"> </xref> interface.
Essa classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: The ControlDesignerState class is a wrapper for the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentDesignerStateService> interface, which is the interface between a designer and a design host, such as [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: A classe ControlDesignerState é um wrapper para o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentDesignerStateService>interface, que é a interface entre um designer e um host de design, como [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)].</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentDesignerStateService>

trans-unit.source: Represents one element, identified by the given key, in the state collection for a control designer.
trans-unit.target: Representa um elemento, identificado por determinada chave, na coleção de estado de um controle de designer.

trans-unit.source: The name of the item to set or retrieve from the state collection.
trans-unit.target: O nome do item a ser definido ou recuperado da coleção de estado.
